movie.title: Life on Us: A Microscopic Safari
movie.title_english: Life on Us: A Microscopic Safari
movie.title_long: Life on Us: A Microscopic Safari (2014)
movie.description_intro: Take a microscopic safari, to meet the creatures that live, compete, feed, and breed on the surface or in the depths of our bodies.
movie.description_full: Take a microscopic safari, to meet the creatures that live, compete, feed, and breed on the surface or in the depths of our bodies.

movies.title: Oil in the Blood
movies.summary: 'Oil in the Blood' is a documentary feature film on the contemporary custom motorcycle culture. It's not a film about motorcycles, it's a film about motorcycle people.
movies.description_full: 'Oil in the Blood' is a documentary feature film on the contemporary custom motorcycle culture. It's not a film about motorcycles, it's a film about motorcycle people.
movies.synopsis: 'Oil in the Blood' is a documentary feature film on the contemporary custom motorcycle culture. It's not a film about motorcycles, it's a film about motorcycle people.

movies.title: Be Here Now
movies.summary: As though life is imitating art, actor and sex-symbol, Andy Whitfield, had just become a star as the lead in the hit television series,'Spartacus,' when he is faced with his biggest personal challenge - life-threatening cancer. 'Be Here Now' is a feature documentary that follows him on his dramatic journey to cure himself. Confirmed in matching affirmative tattoos, he and his charismatic wife and their two children, commit to taking Andy's healing into their own hands and living life fully, not in the shadows of the disease. Each step tests their limits and strength of character, while revealing their tenderness, humor and determination. And, as each person goes through their own transformations, the film becomes an inspiring and universal story of courage, love and resilience.

movies.title: Voyage of Time: Life's Journey
movies.summary: An exploration into our planetary past and a search for humanity's place in the future. With narration by Cate Blanchett.
movies.description_full: An exploration into our planetary past and a search for humanity's place in the future. With narration by Cate Blanchett.
movies.synopsis: An exploration into our planetary past and a search for humanity's place in the future. With narration by Cate Blanchett.

movies.title: Molly: The Real Thing
movies.summary: Over 50 high profile friends including; Kylie and Dannii Minogue, Hugh Jackman, Gene Simmons, Suzi Quatro, Tina Arena, Michael Gudinski, Kate Ceberano, Russell Morris, Colin Hay, Mark Seymour and Jimmy Barnes to name just a few, share their personal stories of the highs and lows of having the man in the hat in their life.
